Get Available Datasets

get_available_datasets.Rd

Details the datasets that your login credentials have access to

get_available_datasets(clear_cache_first = FALSE)

Arguments

clear_cache_first

Boolean detailing if you would like to clear the cached available datasets first. The default is set to FALSE. This option is available so that you can make sure your client fetches any new datasets that you have recently been given access to.

Value

Data.frame object with 14 variables that detail the surveys you can download, their url download links and the country, survey, year etc info for that link.

Details

Searches the DHS website for all the datasets that you can donwload. The results of this function are cached in the client. If you have recently reqeusted new datasets from the DHS website then you can specify to clear the cache first so that you get the new set of datasets avaialble to you. This function is used by get_datasets and should thus be used with `clear_cache_first = TRUE` before using `get_datasets` if you have recently requested new datasets.

Contents

  • Value
